description:
The Normal Talent priority is:
> Noelle's Normal Attack (NA)
> Noelle's Elemental Burst (Q)
> Noelle's Elemental Skill (E)

You can begin transitioning from an ATK build to a DEF build (running a DEF timepiece instead of an ATK timepiece) at Burst Talent 9+ or with C6. Her Skill does not need to be raised, however it is great to have a little extra shielding and healing. It should be noted that raising up her Skill does not enhance her C4 damage.
title: Noelle | Playstyle
